items.name: Quepos Wildlife Encounter
items.short_description: A sanctuary for rescued local wildlife, offering educational tours and a small petting area with friendly farm animals.
items.address: Calle 1, Barrio El Cocal, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Sloth & Bird Haven
items.short_description: Dedicated to sloth conservation, this center allows close encounters with rescued sloths and features an aviary with native birds.
items.address: Km 5, Carretera a Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Rainforest Reptile House
items.short_description: A specialized zoo showcasing the fascinating reptiles and amphibians of the Costa Rican rainforest, with guided interactive sessions.
items.address: Av. Central, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Mariposa Butterfly Garden
items.short_description: Wander through a lush, netted garden filled with hundreds of colorful native butterflies, learning about their life cycles.
items.address: 300m Este del Parque Central, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Jungle Coaster Adventure
items.short_description: A mini-coaster ride designed for younger children, winding through a simulated jungle environment with friendly animal characters.
items.address: Playa Espadilla Norte, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Pirate Ship Spin
items.short_description: A classic spinning teacup ride, but with pirate ship-themed carriages, perfect for families and little adventurers.
items.address: Marina Pez Vela, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Canopy Swing Safari
items.short_description: A gentle swinging ride that lifts kids up for a 'canopy view' simulation, offering a fun, mild thrill with jungle sound effects.
items.address: Costado Sur del Parque La Amistad, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Mini-Train to Paradise
items.short_description: A delightful miniature train ride that takes children on a scenic loop through a landscaped garden, featuring small tunnels and bridges.
items.address: Parque Nacional Manuel Antonio entrada, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Jungle Gym
items.short_description: A multi-level indoor playground with slides, ball pits, and climbing structures, all themed as a vibrant rainforest adventure.
items.address: Plaza Quepos, Carretera a Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Monkey Business Soft Play
items.short_description: A soft play area specifically designed for toddlers and very young children, ensuring a safe and engaging environment for little ones.
items.address: Edificio El Faro, Centro Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Pacific Bounce House Arena
items.short_description: An indoor facility packed with various inflatable bounce houses, obstacle courses, and giant slides for endless jumping fun.
items.address: Detrás de la Municipalidad, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Arcade & Play
items.short_description: Combining classic arcade games with a small, supervised indoor play area, offering something for kids of all ages.
items.address: Centro Comercial Marina Pez Vela, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: The Enchanted Rainforest Magic Show
items.short_description: A family-friendly magic show incorporating local wildlife themes and impressive illusions, held in a cozy theater setting.
items.address: Teatro Quípos, Calle Larga, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Mystical Manuel Antonio Illusions
items.short_description: An intimate show featuring close-up magic, mind-bending illusions, and audience participation, perfect for inquisitive young minds.
items.address: Hotel Costa Verde Salón, Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Captain Fantastico's Magic Voyage
items.short_description: A high-energy show with a pirate theme, combining magic tricks, juggling, and comedic storytelling for all ages.
items.address: Restaurante El Gran Escape, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: The Great Quepos Vanishing Act
items.short_description: Witness a professional magician perform classic vanishing acts and unexpected transformations, with a special focus on audience interaction.
items.address: Centro Cultural Quepos, Calle 1, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: El Duende's Enchanted Trail
items.short_description: A charming walking trail through a lush garden, adorned with tiny houses, gnome statues, and interactive story points from local folklore.
items.address: 2km Este del Parque Central, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Princess & Pirate Cove
items.short_description: A themed play area where kids can dress up as princesses or pirates, explore a small 'castle' and a 'shipwreck,' and engage in imaginative play.
items.address: Playa Espadilla Sur, Manuel Antonio, Puntarenas

items.name: Rainforest Mythical Creatures Garden
items.short_description: Discover sculptures and art installations depicting mythical creatures from Costa Rican folklore, set within a beautiful botanical garden.
items.address: Jardín Botánico Quepos, Carretera a Dominical, Puntarenas

items.name: The Whispering Woods Story Path
items.short_description: Follow a magical path marked with storyboards and audio points that narrate classic fairy tales and local legends, culminating in a small puppet show area.
items.address: Sector Naranjo, Ruta 235, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Brick Builders Studio
items.short_description: A dedicated space for LEGO enthusiasts, featuring large building tables, a vast collection of bricks, and themed build challenges.
items.address: Marina Pez Vela, Local 12, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Mini-Constructors Zone
items.short_description: An interactive area where young children can play with large, soft building blocks, excavators, and construction-themed toys in a safe environment.
items.address: Plaza Central Quepos, frente al Banco Nacional, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Robot & Gadget Lab
items.short_description: Focuses on robotics and simple engineering, allowing kids to build and program basic robots using LEGO Mindstorms and similar kits.
items.address: Centro de Convenciones, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Tower Building Challenge
items.short_description: A fun, competitive zone where kids can build the tallest, strongest, or most creative structures using various materials, with daily contests.
items.address: 100m Norte de la Estación de Buses, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Jungle Explorers Park
items.short_description: A mini-theme park with several themed zones focusing on rainforest animals, featuring small rides, educational exhibits, and a play village.
items.address: Km 4, Carretera a Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Dino-Rica Adventure Land
items.short_description: Step back in time to a dinosaur-themed park featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digs, and a prehistoric-themed playground.
items.address: Lado Oeste de la Reserva Biológica, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: The Water Safari Oasis
items.short_description: A small water-themed park perfect for cooling off, with splash pads, mini-slides, and gentle water attractions for younger children.
items.address: 500m Norte del Centro Quepos, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Pirates of the Pacific Playhouse
items.short_description: An immersive pirate-themed area with a large shipwreck playground, treasure hunts, and interactive shows with pirate characters.
items.address: Playa Bisanz, Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Mini Golf Rainforest
items.short_description: A fun 18-hole miniature golf course themed around the local rainforest, complete with animal statues and water features.
items.address: Marina Pez Vela, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Soccer Kidz Futsal Courts
items.short_description: Two indoor futsal courts designed for children's leagues and pickup games, offering a safe and shaded environment for young footballers.
items.address: Polideportivo Quepos, Barrio El Cocal, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Ninja Warrior Junior
items.short_description: A scaled-down obstacle course inspired by ninja warrior competitions, designed for kids to test their agility, balance, and strength.
items.address: Gimnasio Municipal, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Skateboard & Scooter Parkette
items.short_description: A small, beginner-friendly skate park with gentle ramps, rails, and a smooth surface, perfect for kids learning to skateboard or scooter.
items.address: Parque de la Juventud, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Manuel Antonio Marine Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive center focused on the marine life of the Pacific, with touch tanks, educational exhibits, and a virtual reality dive experience.
items.address: Puerto de Quepos, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Rainforest Ecology Lab
items.short_description: Kids can learn about the rainforest ecosystem through hands-on experiments, microscope stations, and guided nature walks.
items.address: Junto a Manuel Antonio National Park, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Volcanic Wonders Exhibit
items.short_description: Explores Costa Rica's volcanic activity and geology through interactive models, simulated eruptions, and rock collections.
items.address: Centro Cultural Quepos, Calle 1, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Little Explorers Planetarium
items.short_description: A small, inflatable planetarium offering engaging shows about the stars, planets, and constellations visible from Costa Rica.
items.address: Biblioteca Pública de Quepos, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Lost Treasure of Quepos Escape Room (Kids Edition)
items.short_description: A family-friendly escape room challenging teams to solve puzzles and find hidden treasure before time runs out.
items.address: Edificio El Sol, Calle Central, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: The Great Monkey Scavenger Hunt
items.short_description: An outdoor scavenger hunt across a designated nature area, where kids follow clues to find 'monkey treasures' and learn about local wildlife.
items.address: Parque Recreativo La Paz, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Jungle Survival Kids Challenge
items.short_description: A guided outdoor adventure where children learn basic survival skills like fire starting (safely), knot tying, and tracking, through a fun quest narrative.
items.address: Finca La Amistad, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Marina Mystery: The Missing Dolphin Tale
items.short_description: An interactive role-playing quest set around Marina Pez Vela, where kids interview 'characters' and solve clues to find a 'missing dolphin.'
items.address: Marina Pez Vela, Quepos, Puntarenas
